name: Lapel
long_description:
Lapel is a customer operations platform that brings hospitality to the internet: one real-time view of every account and tools for every customer touchpoint.

Today, most customer relationships are managed through dashboards, funnels, and canned replies—great for metrics, terrible for humans.

Customers don’t draw lines between sales, success, and support, and your software shouldn’t either.

Learn more at lapel.com
one_liner: Customer operations platform for internet businesses.
